title: Excellent finish from Aston Villa striker Ollie Watkins denies Arsenal crucial victory in Premier League title race (Video)

text: Arsenal were on their way to book three important points in the Premier League title race when Gabriel Martinelli and Kai Havertz put them two goals ahead against Aston Villa at the Emirates on Saturday. But the visitors had other ideas, and after Youri Tielemans halved their deficit on the hour mark, Ollie Watkins struck this fine goal to set the final score at 2-2. Arsenal now trail league leaders Liverpool by six points, with the Merseysiders having a game in hand as well. A familiar sight üòç pic.twitter.com/dOXP0J7503 ‚Äî Aston Villa (@AVFCOfficial) January 18, 2025
html:
Arsenal were on their way to book three important points in the Premier League title race when Gabriel Martinelli and Kai Havertz put them two goals ahead against Aston Villa at the Emirates on Saturday. But the visitors had other ideas, and after Youri Tielemans halved their deficit on the hour mark, Ollie Watkins struck this fine goal to set the final score at 2-2.

Arsenal now trail league leaders Liverpool by six points, with the Merseysiders having a game in hand as well.

A familiar sight üòç pic.twitter.com/dOXP0J7503

‚Äî Aston Villa (@AVFCOfficial) January 18, 2025
